name: Pong powered by Godot
description:
Testing out Godot game engine and getting a feel for it using the pong tutorial in the documentation. It sure is faster to prototype with it compared to using just plain c++! The scenes and nodes architecture is very elegant and fast to work with.The preexisting classes are more than enough to create most things you would need in a 2d game.

Made in 3 hours as a beginner programmer. Art provided by documentation.
